messages.subject: VT/NH/CT  site seeing ideas
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, If you have any personal recommendation for must sees within an hour or two of route 89 between Boston and Richmond VT and then back down 91 to 95,
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
If you have any personal recommendation for "must sees" within an hour or two of route 89 between Boston and Richmond VT and then back down 91 to 95, let me know. We are going to try to hit a few things after the conference. Also if you know good places to spend the night on 89 that would be appreciated too.
Thanks,
Beth in MD
FYI the kids are 16.12 and almost 9

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
